main event: An unidentified object was reported as an intermittent phenomenon observed at great height.
interesting points: The object exhibited continuous intermittent white and red flashing without leaving a track., The sighting lasted for approximately 40 seconds., The object was believed to be larger than a balloon and did not exhibit the motion typical of a meteor., It was reported from a U.S. Coast Guard position in Argentina., There was a request for information about possible missile operations on the days surrounding the sighting.
sighted object: an unidentified object emitting flashing lights
witness description: There were no confirmed witnesses detailed in the report.
